mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT v.id, v.voteOptionNo, (SELECT count(id) FROM dqsj_fe_vote_user_detail b WHERE b.voteOptionId = v.id) as votedCount, v.voteOptionTitle, v.remark, v.voteOptionPicUrl, v.voteOptionContent, v.voteOrder, v.updateDate FROM dqsj_sm_vote_option v WHERE v.deleteFlag = '0' and v.voteId = '${voteId}' and v.id = '${id}' ORDER BY v.voteOrder ASC, v.updateDate DESC
SELECT count(distinct v.id) FROM dqsj_sm_vote_option v WHERE v.deleteFlag = '0' and v.voteId = '${voteId}' and v.voteOptionNo = '${voteOptionNo}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dqsj_sm_vote_option ( id, voteId, voteOptionNo, voteOptionTitle, voteOptionPicUrl, createDate, createUserId, updateDate, updateUserId, deleteFlag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{voteId}, #{voteOptionNo}, #{voteOptionTitle}, #{voteOptionPicUrl}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUserId}, #{deleteFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dqsj_sm_vote_option SET voteOrder= #{voteOrder}, remark= #{remark}, voteOptionNo= #{voteOptionNo}, voteOptionTitle= #{voteOptionTitle}, voteOptionPicUrl= #{voteOptionPicUrl}, updateDate= #{updateDate}, updateUserId= #{updateUserId} WHERE id = #{id}
